title: Eco-Conscious Duplex with Mountain Views in Serene Dyrekcja
description: Embrace modern, eco-conscious living in this spacious 160 sqm duplex featuring a striking modern façade. With 3 generous bedrooms and 3 elegant bathrooms, this home combines open design with functional comfort. A thoughtful floor plan includes bright living areas, ample storage,and built-in wardrobes that keep the space organized and ready for contemporary lifestyles.
neighborhood_description: Set in the tranquil Dyrekcja neighborhood of Chełm, this property offers a rare mix of green surroundings and breathtaking mountain views. This low-urban area provides peaceful proximity to open nature, ideal for those seeking balance away from city bustle. Quick highway connections make commuting and weekend getaways effortless.
lifestyle_benefits: quiet, green setting ideal for relaxation
ample room for hobbies or home office
target_buyer: Perfect for young couples who appreciate sustainable, aesthetically pleasing design and desire a peaceful retreat close to nature, yet value connectivity for work or adventures.
market_positioning: This unique duplex stands out in the Chełm market for its blend of modern finishes, eco-conscious features, and natural setting—all at an accessible price point, offering excellent value and lifestyle appeal for buyers seeking a contemporary home in a quiet area.
